item.title: Evolution of Data Lakehouse Architecture
item.author: bijil.subhash@gmail.com (Bijil Subhash)
item.description: The first time I have heard about data lakehouse was 2.5 years ago at the DataEngBytes conference. Back then, I was still in university and most of the content of the day went over my head. Fast forward to 2024, I have since graduated and has been working as a data engineer at Mantel Group for nearly 1.5 years now. Just over a month ago, I came across data lakehouse again as I was starting to get myself ready for some upcoming projects on Databricks.
